sentences.sContent: He was an accomplished politician and a crafty autocrat.
sentences.sContent_eng: He was an accomplished politician and a crafty autocrat.
sentences.sCn: 他是个有造诣的政治家，也是个狡黠的独裁者。

sentences.sContent: He was an accomplished politician and a crafty autocrat.
sentences.sContent_eng: He was an accomplished politician and a crafty autocrat.
sentences.sCn: 他是个杰出的政治家，也是个狡黠的独裁者。

sentences.sContent: She wrote a lot of books that exposed the avarice of the authoritarian . the autocracy of the autocrat and the falsity of the autonomy.
sentences.sContent_eng: She wrote a lot of books that exposed the avarice of the authoritarian . the autocracy of the autocrat and the falsity of the autonomy.
sentences.sCn: 她写了许多书，暴露了权力主义者的贪婪，独裁者的独裁政体和自治权的虚伪。

synos.tran: 独裁者，专制君主；独断独行的人

remMethod.val: auto (自己) + crat (统治者) → 独裁者

trans.tranOther: a ruler who has complete power over a country
